text: mariyu atanito batu iddaru yuvakulu kuda cerasalalo pravesincaru. Varilo okadu annadu: "Nenu sarayi pindutu unnatlu kala cusanu!" Rendo vadu annadu: "Nenu na talapai rottelu mostunnatlu, vatini paksulu tintunnatlu kalalo cusanu." (Iddaru kalisi annaru): "Maku dini bhavanni telupu. Niscayanga, memu ninnu sajjanuniga custunnamu
